Name: Helena Abadie
Text: The school is amazing ! I cannot say enough about the staff .Ms. Linh is amazing!It truly is a family like environment. The instructors were always incredibly helpful<span class='more'> and informative. Highly recommend attending!<span>

Name: Rawand Abed al haq
Text: as an esthetician student I highly recommend attending to 89 Beaty school , the instructors are very informative and helpful , it was a wonderful experience
